name: handhRL
tagline: A simple roguelike based on the Hulks and Horrors tabletop RPG written with Python 2.7 and libtcod
body:
# handhRL
=======

A simple roguelike based on the _Hulks and Horrors_ tabletop RPG written with Python 2.7 and libtcod.

Code is based on the excellent tutorial here: http://www.roguebasin.com/index.php?title=Complete_Roguelike_Tutorial,_using_python%2Blibtcod

_Hulks and Horrors_ is a tabletop roleplaying game inspired by classic Red Box, with a sci-fi reimagining. More on that here: http://www.bedroomwallpress.com/p/hulks-and-horrors.html

libtcod is distributed under the BSD license. See LIBTCOD-LICENSE.txt. The SDL library is distributed according to the LGPL as mentioned in README-SDL.txt.

handhRL is (c) 2014 by John Berry. Licensing TBD.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
